statements: SELECT * FROM LegislativeData;
SELECT name, party FROM LegislativeData;
SELECT name, district, policy_change_date FROM LegislativeData WHERE party='Republican';
SELECT * FROM LegislativeData ORDER BY policy_change_date DESC;
SELECT name, party, district FROM LegislativeData WHERE district='ABC' ORDER BY party ASC;
SELECT name, party, district FROM LegislativeData WHERE party = 'Democratic' ORDER BY name ASC, district DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM LegislativeData WHERE policy_change_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY policy_change_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT legislator_id, name, party FROM LegislativeData WHERE district IN ('District A', 'District B')
SELECT * FROM LegislativeData WHERE policy_change_description LIKE '%ecosystem%' LIMIT 5
SELECT name, district, policy_change_date FROM LegislativeData ORDER BY policy_change_date ASC, legislator_id DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM public.policies;
SELECT policy_name, policy_year FROM public.policies WHERE policy_category = 'Health';
SELECT policy_name, policy_category FROM public.policies ORDER BY policy_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM public.policy_changes WHERE change_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT policy_id, policy_name FROM public.policies WHERE policy_year BETWEEN 2020 AND 2021;
SELECT * FROM public.policies WHERE policy_year > 2020;
SELECT policy_id, policy_name FROM public.policies WHERE policy_category = 'Healthcare';
SELECT policy_id, policy_name, policy_year FROM public.policies ORDER BY policy_year DESC;
SELECT * FROM public.policies JOIN public.policy_changes ON public.policies.policy_id = public.policy_changes.policy_id;

SELECT policy_id, policy_name, change_date, change_description FROM public.policies JOIN public.policy_changes ON public.policies.policy_id = public.policy_changes.policy_id WHERE policy_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM PublicPolicyLegislation;
SELECT legislation_title, legislative_body FROM PublicPolicyLegislation;
SELECT MAX(date_enacted) FROM PublicPolicyLegislation;
SELECT * FROM LegislativeChanges WHERE change_type = 'Amendment';
SELECT analyst_name, analyst_field FROM PolicyAnalysts;
SELECT * FROM PublicPolicyLegislation;
SELECT legislation_title, legislative_body FROM PublicPolicyLegislation;
SELECT legislation_title, date_enacted FROM PublicPolicyLegislation WHERE date_enacted >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM PublicPolicyLegislation WHERE legislation_id IN (SELECT legislation_id FROM LegislativeChanges WHERE change_type = 'Amendment');
SELECT analyst_name, analyst_field FROM PolicyAnalysts WHERE analyst_field IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM legislators;
SELECT full_name, party, state FROM legislators WHERE party = 'Democratic';
SELECT bill_title, bill_type, status FROM bills WHERE introduction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT hearing_title, committee, hearing_date FROM hearings ORDER BY hearing_date DESC;
SELECT full_name, party, state, start_date, end_date FROM legislators WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT * FROM legislators WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT full_name, party FROM legislators WHERE district = 5 AND start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT bill_title, introduction_date FROM bills WHERE status = 'pending' ORDER BY introduction_date DESC;
SELECT hearing_title, committee, location FROM hearings WHERE hearing_date > '2022-06-01';
SELECT full_name AS legislator_name, party AS political_party FROM legislators WHERE party = 'Republican' AND state = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM legislators;
SELECT name, party FROM legislators WHERE state = 'CA';
SELECT * FROM bills ORDER BY introduced_date DESC;
SELECT title, sponsor_id FROM bills WHERE introduced_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT name AS committee_name, chair_id FROM committees;
SELECT * FROM legislators WHERE state = 'NY';
SELECT name, party FROM legislators ORDER BY party DESC;
SELECT name, count(*) as vote_count FROM legislators JOIN votes ON legislators.legislator_id = votes.legislator_id GROUP BY legislators.legislator_id;

SELECT legislators.name as legislator_name, bills.title as bill_title, votes.vote_type FROM legislators JOIN votes ON legislators.legislator_id = votes.legislator_id JOIN bills ON votes.bill_id = bills.bill_id WHERE legislators.state = 'CA';

SELECT committees.name as committee_name, legislators.name as chair_name, legislators.party as chair_party FROM committees JOIN legislators ON committees.chair_id = legislators.legislator_id WHERE legislators.party = 'Republican';
